snippet.title: Aldian of Ancients- Tokyo Game Show Promo
snippet.description:
We are delighted to announce that Aldian of Ancients is one of the games chosen for the Selected 80 Indies at the Tokyo Game Show, 2024. Here is a glimpse of what we intend to showcase at the expo. You will find numerous dinosaurs across different settings; forest, Skove, swamp, and drylands. Spawn as a baby dinosaur, traverse through multiple biomes in your quest to survive. With the liberty to craft your own story, you will get to decide if you want to be a part of a pack or take down your nemesis alone. 

Aldian of Ancients is a dinosaur multiplayer simulation/survival game that aims to recreate the world of yore filled with creatures that defy comprehension.

Immerse yourself in an ancient world, lost in the shuffle of evolution, filled with creatures that impart awe and wonder. Explore a beautifully crafted open world filled with flora and fauna from bygone ages.

=====================

Website: https://norian.studio/
Discord: https://discord.gg/qUbUjnQYdC
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/aldianofanc...
Twitter: https://x.com/noriangames?s=11

#teaser #tokyogameshow #tokyo #dinosaurgames #survivalgame
